植物 @ 断桥头卖鱼人散 :: 痞客邦 PIXNET ::... ... 月桃 Shellflower 南美蟛蜞菊 Yellow dots.

means.word_mean: 1. showy perennial of marshlands of eastern and central North America having waxy lanceolate leaves and flower with lower part creamy white and upper parts pale pink to deep purple
2. cultivated for its shining oblong leaves and arching clusters of white flowers with shell-pink shading and crinkled yellow lip with variegated magenta stripes
